XTools - Free Open Source Data-Secure Toolbox

XTools is a free, open-source, and data-secure online toolbox that provides various utilities for everyday file operations. All processing happens locally in your browser, ensuring your data never leaves your device.

## Core Features

### Data Security
- Complete local processing, no data uploaded to servers
- Privacy protection, secure handling of sensitive information
- No registration required, ready to use immediately
- Offline support

### Image Processing Tools
- Image Compression: Lossless compression of image file sizes
- Image Format Conversion: Convert between PNG, JPG, WEBP, AVIF, QOI, JXL formats
- AI Background Removal: Automatically remove image backgrounds using artificial intelligence
- Image Mosaic: Add mosaic effects to images for privacy protection
- Image Resizing: Adjust image dimensions and aspect ratios

### SVG Vector Graphics Tools
- SVG Preview: Real-time SVG code preview and visualization
- SVG Optimization: Clean and optimize SVG files
- SVG Conversion: Convert SVG to PNG, JPG, PDF formats
- Raster to Vector: Convert PNG, JPG to SVG vector graphics

### Screenshot Tools
- App Store Cover Generator: Create App Store application covers
- Xiaohongshu Cover Generator: Generate Xiaohongshu cover images

### Favicon Tools
- Icon Converter: Convert images to website icon formats
- Icon Generator: Create complete icon packages for websites

### Video Processing Tools
- Video Compression: Reduce video file sizes while maintaining acceptable quality

### Audio Processing Tools
- Audio Converter: Convert between different audio formats

### Date Utilities
- DayJS Utils: Date manipulation and formatting using DayJS
- MomentJS Utils: Date operations with MomentJS
- Date Utils: General date conversion and calculation tools

### Text Processing Tools
- Text Converter: Transform text between different formats and encodings (Simplified/Traditional Chinese, etc.)
- Text Diff: Compare and highlight differences between text samples

### Writing Tools
- Word Count: Analyze text for word, character, and sentence counts

## Technology Stack

### Frontend Technologies
- React 18.3.1 - Modern React framework
- TypeScript 5.6.2 - Type-safe JavaScript
- Vite 6.0.5 - Fast build tool
- Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 - Utility-first CSS framework
- React Router DOM 7.1.1 - Client-side routing

### Image Processing Libraries
- @jsquash/* - High-performance image processing
- @imgly/background-removal - AI background removal
- Jimp - Image processing library
- Sharp - High-performance image processing

### Video Audio Processing
- @ffmpeg/ffmpeg - Browser-side FFmpeg
- @ffmpeg/core - FFmpeg core library

### File Processing
- FileSaver - File download
- JSZip - ZIP file processing
- SVG2PDF.js - SVG to PDF conversion

### Internationalization
- i18next - Multi-language support
- Supports Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, German

### Development Tools
- ESLint - Code quality checking
- Prettier - Code formatting
- TypeScript ESLint - TypeScript code checking

## Supported File Formats

### Image Formats
- PNG, JPG, JPEG, WEBP, AVIF, QOI, JXL
- HEIC, HEIF (iOS devices)
- SVG vector graphics

### Video Formats
- MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV, MKV, etc.

### Audio Formats
- MP3, WAV, AAC, OGG, FLAC, etc.

### Document Formats
- PDF (SVG to PDF)

## Development Guide

### Requirements
- Node.js (LTS version recommended)
- pnpm package manager

### Installation and Running
```bash
git clone git@github.com:Go7hic/xxootools-web.git
cd xxootools-web
pnpm install
pnpm dev
```

### Build and Deploy
```bash
pnpm build
pnpm preview
pnpm generate-pwa-icons
```
